text: Ron Lester (August 4, 1970 - June 17, 2016) was an American actor. He was best known for his roles in the movies Varsity Blues, Not Another Teen Movie, Good Burger, and the TV show Popular. He was born in Kennesaw, Georgia. Lester died at a hospital in Dallas, Texas on June 17, 2016 from liver and kidney failure, aged 45.Ron Lester, Varsity Blues star, dies at 45 ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website * Category:1970 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Deaths from liver failure Category:Deaths from renal failure Category:Disease-related deaths in Texas Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Georgia (U.S. state)
title: Ron Lester
